text.paragraph-1: I'm excited to bring my passion for web development to your projects.
text.paragraph-2: While I'm just starting my career, I've got a strong grasp of Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript and other useful tools.
text.paragraph-3: My commitment to learning and growing as a professional is unwavering, and Iâ€™m also passionate about creating dynamic, responsive and user-friendly web applications.
text.paragraph-4: What do you think about teaming up and creating something great together?

mainTasks.text: Some tasks I'm really good at:

part-1.title: I am a 4th-year Software Engineering student at Chernihiv Polytechnic University.

paragraphs.1: I've always enjoyed programming, and when I created my first web application, I realized this is the field I want to pursue professionally.

part-2.title: Even though I haven't had any formal work experience yet, I've spent a lot of time working on various projects for practice.

paragraphs.1: I've tackled different types of projects on my own, dealing with different technologies and levels of difficulty.
paragraphs.2: These projects have given me hands-on experience and allowed me to explore many aspects of web development. Whether it's a small project or a large one, I've faced various challenges, which helped me sharpen my skills along the way.
